item.title: Docker Compose
item.description: $ git clone https://gitlink.org.cn/ccfos/nightingale.git $ cd nightingale/docker $ docker-compose up -d Creating network "docker_nightingale" with driver "bridge" Creating mysql ... done Creating redis ... done Creating prometheus ... done Creating ibex ... done Creating agentd ... done Creating nwebapi ... done Creating nserver ... done Creating telegraf ... done $ docker-compose ps NAME IMAGE COMMAND SERVICE CREATED STATUS PORTS categraf flashcatcloud/categraf:latest "/entrypoint.sh" categraf 2 days ago Up 2 days ibex ulric2019/ibex:0.

item.title: Helm
item.description: https://github.com/flashcatcloud/n9e-helm The default username is root and default password is root.2020.
